items.content_html: react-pagination-with-dots is a lightweight and flexible pagination component designed for modern React applications. Built with simplicity and performance in mind, it allows for easy navigation between pages while providing a user-friendly, dot-based indicator to highlight the current page.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript countdown library with zero dependencies. Create customizable countdown timers with multiple themes, TypeScript support, and a countdown control API for websites and web applications.

items.content_html: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
